website_summaries.verdict: Cute bootie that doesn’t sacrifice style for comfort.
pros: Zipper and elastic keeps foot held snug
The 2.5-inch heel is dressy but still walkable
cons: Some found the ankle area caused friction

customer_reviews.title: Love these booties
customer_reviews.text: Love these booties! Seriously the most comfortable booties ever. Heel is not too low, not too high. I ordered these in three colors and just love them. Clark's has circled around to not only comfort but style. I'm definitely a fan!
customer_reviews.author: ShoeLovr

customer_reviews.title: love these boots..
customer_reviews.text: I was a Aerosole girl, friend told me about Clarks, I love these boots, leather is so soft, fit is perfect.. Will be buying another color.. heel is perfect. Buy these boots..
customer_reviews.author: KAT714

customer_reviews.title: They look fabulous and are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Fit as expected, they look great and are comfortable. I can’t walk all over town in them because the heels get stuck in sidewalk grates, etc., but I take them to work and wear them all day there. I get so many compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, comfortable and a welcome addition to my wardrobe. My feet are still happy after a long day at work.
customer_reviews.author: JW in Western Oregon

customer_reviews.title: I just love Clark shoes and boots and these are just what ...
customer_reviews.text: I just love Clark shoes and boots and these are just what I expected, well made, comfortable. Hesitated to get a heel cuz I'm 71, but these are as comfortable as my other clarks.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: disappointed in Clarks
customer_reviews.text: the boot is very classy and looks great with everything. However I found that the left heal is off centered, making the shoe land at an angle when I walk; I'm always twisting my ankle when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Arascal611

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ankle boot. I ordered the wide and they fit wonderfully. Nice leather and very little break in time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Pandofi

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Dressy comfortable boot. A little large corrected with thin insole.Could have gone down 1/2 size
customer_reviews.author: s field

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bootie
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a wide shoe because that was all that was available. These are really cute and very comfortable! The heel isn’t too high but still looks stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not even sure where to start... I ordered new boots and received these .
customer_reviews.author: athomemom

customer_reviews.title: Snug but that's good! She said very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Go these for my niece, she loves them. Snug but that's good! She said very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fit just right.
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They went perfect with my holiday dresses. They are absolutely comfortable. My only complaint was the shipping. Out of the 40+ items I purchased through Amazon, these got lost for a couple of weeks in shipment. The only reason I got was that it was due to the holidays. Oh well, I got them and just in time for the first occasion.
customer_reviews.author: CDBW

customer_reviews.title: XMAS Gift
customer_reviews.text: XMAS Gift have no idea. But my daughter asked specifically for these
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Carnes

product_meta.title: Clarks Women's Arista Paige Ankle Bootie
product_meta.description: This dress boot will have you walking in style. the arista paige is made with cushion soft technology and an ortholite footbed for added comfort.
